name: Rocky Teodoro
text: Third possibility: people are more discerning and form their own opinions. Media plays a part in informing them but isn't the end-all and be-all.

source_obj.text: Third possibility: people are more discerning and form their own opinions. Media plays a part in informing them but isn't the end-all and be-all.

replies.text: The great irony in all of this is seeing people disregard relationships fostered over several years due to events in the last 100 days.
I'm sure you and I are discerning, but the reactions of the masses on social media do not make me optimistic that they are becoming more discerning
There are also the rabid ones, mala World War Z at Train To Busan ang peg; if you are not one of them they will bite you ü   Not limited to the masa.
